Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Gargh... I, Golden Jegan, have fallen so easily... What a shame...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Golden Jegan was defeated, he took out the artifact fragment that he had been protecting just like other Demon Generals. This was probably a system setting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The battle is over.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Demon General closed his eyes, but Lucia pulled her blade back.'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "Um, aren't you going to finish me off?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Like I said, I didn't want to use violence. Plus, there's still something we want to know from you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Hmph. As heroes of revelation, you are quite different...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Just like Karenina said... Have you been watching us all along?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "Of course... That's why I also know who you are looking for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you mean Liv?', 3: '13', 4: 'Is she nearby?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "Indeed... That's how His Majesty calls her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "She's further away, with His Majesty. They didn't go past here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait a sec. Are you suggesting Liv is with the Demon King?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Correct. She met His Majesty ever since she arrived in this world, and they have been moving together.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '...But the stone monument said the Demon King was already killed by the heroes. Did he come back to life again?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Before the last Demon King was destroyed, he separated a small potion of his power, which became the Demon King now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'He also realized his mistake and asked us to never harm humans again. But we never thought the humans would come at us this time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'So he decided to start his plan after you arrived here...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You call Liv the Holy Maiden. Does she have anything to do with that plan?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Of course... Only she can save us Demons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'And this world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How can she save you?', 3: '24', 4: 'Where are they now?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "By going to the Demon King's Castle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "On their way to the Demon King's Castle.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "The Demon King's Castle?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But the gate can only be opened after all artifact fragments are collected!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'It\'s called the "Demon King\'s Castle." Do you think a castle will not respond to its owner?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "Not to mention the Goddess' artifact was originally... Wait, what's this...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The conversation was interrupted as Golden Jegan became very anxious. He looked very shocked, then started to panic.'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Heroes from afar, I am going to use my magic to launch the artifact away. Please follow it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hah? Are you eating your words already?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'No, but His Majesty and the Holy Maiden are in danger. As a Demon General, I cannot go out!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Please, go help them!', 4: '1'}
